about_the_game:
Someone has disappeared, someone who would never choose to leave the family so suddenly, someone too young to make it on their own. And what ’s worse, she’s not the first.

Investigate the disappearance of a little girl and live the memories of those tragic moments in the shoes of the little one.

Informations

Nothing is Known - the innocents is a narrative adventure, set somewhere in Southern Italy in the late 80s, playing as Dana, you will investigate to find the missing little girl.

At the same time, you will play the moments of terror of the little girl who disappeared, trying to connect the information you will get from the point of view of the two characters to solve the case.

The Italianness of the characters is also dressed in the voice, giving an even more personal soul to each character.

The game

During the gameplay of Nothing is known - the innocents, in the role of Dana you will be put to the test several times:

  • Through the dialogues you will be called to put your empathic skills into play, carefully choosing the questions to ask.

  • During the searches you will have to use all your ingenuity and your investigative skills to solve enigmas and small puzzles that you will find in front of you.

  • Through the QTE system you will have to be able to identify with the other characters, choosing the answer based on the mood of the conversation.

  • Explore the neighborhoods of an Italy steeped in silence, which will surprise you only if you accept to understand it.

Emotions are the tool through which you will experience this story: subterfuge, lies, mystery, but also love, remorse, brotherhood and equality.

content_descriptors.notes: The story is inspired by a true crime story. The theme deals with the disappearance of several children, strong language might be used on specific situations.
